p: The effects of CS-LO on acute inflammation were tested with the Carr-induced paw edema model. As shown in Figure 4(a), there was a dose-related inhibition of CS-LO to hind paw edema. Especially at 200 mg/kg, CS-LO significantly inhibited (p < 0.01) the development of Carr-induced paw edema. Indo (10 mg/kg) significantly decreased the Carr-induced paw edema as well.
